history.proof: intros n m p H. sauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: pose proof (N.mul_lt_mono_pos_l p n m H) as H'.
exceptions.exn: In environment n, m, p : N H : p * n < p * m The term "H" has type "p * n < p * m" while it is expected to have type "0 < p".

original: intros n m p H. pose proof (N.mul_lt_mono_pos_l p n m H) as H'. pose proof (N.le_lt_trans _ _ _ H' H) as H''. pose proof (N.lt_le_trans _ _ _ H H') as H. apply H''.
